tiers.name: Starter System
tiers.tagline: Plug-and-play structure for service providers who want to stop managing chaos.

included: Core pages: Home, Services, Booking & Checkout, Contact
Guided setup flow (business details, services, pricing)
Basic booking rules: working hours, simple deposits OR full payment
excluded: No domain assistance beyond basic instructions

tiers.name: Business System
tiers.tagline: Your website works the way your business actually works.

included: Flexible structure (you adjust pages and flow)
Additional pages: About, Policies / Terms, FAQ
Advanced booking rules: buffer times, cancellation windows, deposits + balance logic
Automated emails: booking confirmation, reminders, cancellation notices
One guided setup or review session

tiers.name: Full Operations Suite
tiers.tagline: A website that replaces a receptionist, a notebook, and half your mental load.

included: Full page set: Home, About, Services, Booking, Blog / Content, Legal pages
Client journey design: how clients discover, how they book, how they pay, how they behave
Advanced booking & checkout logic: service-specific rules, conditional deposits
